trans-unit.source: Contains various utility functions for backward compatibility with Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: 包含各種公用程式函式，提供與 Visual Basic 6.0 的回溯相容性 (Backward Compatibility)。

trans-unit.source: The functions in this class are used during the upgrade of Visual Basic 6.0 projects to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 專案，Visual Basic 6.0 升級期間，會使用這個類別中的函式。

trans-unit.source: Some functions replace Visual Basic 6.0 functions that are no longer supported in Visual Basic; others compensate for differences in the object models.
trans-unit.target: 某些函式取代，不再支援在 Visual Basic; Visual Basic 6.0 函式其他人補償物件模型中的差異。

trans-unit.source: To use functions in this class in a Visual Basic project, add a reference to the `Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6` namespace.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這個類別，在 Visual Basic 專案中的函式，將參考加入`Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6`命名空間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: Duplicates Visual Basic 6.0 functionality of assigning an <see langword="Array" /> to a <see langword="Variant" />.
trans-unit.target: 複製將 <see langword="Array" /> 指派給 <see langword="Variant" /> 的 Visual Basic 6.0 功能。

trans-unit.source: The array to copy.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Basic 6.0 `Variant` data type is no longer supported in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 6.0`Variant`在 Visual Basic 中不支援資料類型。

trans-unit.source: The `CopyArray` function is used by the upgrade tools to copy an `Array` to or from a `Variant` array.
trans-unit.target: `CopyArray`函式可由升級工具來複製`Array`往或來自`Variant`陣列。

trans-unit.source: To copy an array in Visual Basic, use the <xref:System.Array.Clone%2A>, <xref:System.Array.Copy%2A> or <xref:System.Array.CopyTo%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Array> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要在 Visual Basic 中複製的陣列，使用<xref:System.Array.Clone%2A>，<xref:System.Array.Copy%2A>或<xref:System.Array.CopyTo%2A>方法<xref:System.Array>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要進行轉換的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an OLE <see langword="IPicture" /> object that corresponds to the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回對應至指定之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> 的 OLE <see langword="IPicture" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the OLE <see langword="IPicture" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示 OLE <see langword="IPicture" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, the `MouseIcon` property of a form or control could be used to load a custom `MousePointer` (cursor).
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0`MouseIcon`表單或控制項的屬性無法用來載入自訂`MousePointer`（游標）。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the image for the `MouseIcon` was stored as a `stdOle.IPicture`; this function is used by the upgrade tool to convert a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor> to a `stdOle.IPicture`.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，針對映像`MouseIcon`儲存為`stdOle.IPicture`; 此函式可由升級工具來轉換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>至`stdOle.IPicture`。

trans-unit.source: To convert a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor> in Visual Basic, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.GetIPictureFromCursor%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost> class.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>在 Visual Basic 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.GetIPictureFromCursor%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>類別。

trans-unit.target: 要比較的 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two expressions are equal; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個運算式相等則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If either expression is `Null`, result is also `Null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一個運算式是`Null`，結果也是`Null`。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, the `Eqv` operator is no longer a part of the Visual Basic language; use the equals (=) comparison operator in place of `Eqv` for logical evaluations.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中`Eqv`運算子不再是 Visual Basic 語言的一部分; 請使用等於 （=） 比較運算子，取代`Eqv`邏輯評估。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, the `Eqv` operator is no longer a part of the Visual Basic language; for bitwise evaluations use the `Not` and `XOr` operators.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中`Eqv`運算子已不再針對位元評估使用; Visual Basic 語言的一部分`Not`和`XOr`運算子。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to set the <see cref="F:System.Drawing.FontStyle.Bold" /> style bit; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示設定 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.FontStyle.Bold" /> 樣式位元，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Changes the <see cref="F:System.Drawing.FontStyle.Bold" /> style bit for a font.
trans-unit.target: 變更字型的 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.FontStyle.Bold" /> 樣式位元 (Style Bit)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> with the new style applied.
trans-unit.target: 已套用新樣式的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, font styles were applied by setting properties; in Visual Basic font styles are applied by using a <xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 6.0 中的字型樣式套用設定的屬性;在 Visual Basic 字型樣式適用於使用<xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to translate the Visual Basic 6.0 properties to the new enumerations.
trans-unit.target: 此函式升級工具用於將轉譯的 Visual Basic 6.0 屬性，以新的列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: A byte value that specifies the GDI character set to use.
trans-unit.target: 位元組值，指定要使用的 GDI 字元集。

trans-unit.source: Returns a font for a specified GDI character set.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之 GDI 字元集 (Character Set) 的字型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> for the specified GDI character set.
trans-unit.target: 指定之 GDI 字元集的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, the `stdFont` object had a `CharSet` property that specified the GDI character set for a font.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0`stdFont`物件有`CharSet`屬性所指定的 GDI 字元集的字型。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, the character set is specified as an optional of a <xref:System.Drawing.Font> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中為選用的指定字元集<xref:System.Drawing.Font>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to convert a `stdFont` to a <xref:System.Drawing.Font>.
trans-unit.target: 此函式可由升級工具來轉換`stdFont`至<xref:System.Drawing.Font>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> for a given Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Font" />.

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />，符合 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Font" />。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, the name of a font was specified by the `Font` property; in Visual Basic, <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Name%2A> is a property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 6.0 中所指定的字型名稱`Font`屬性; 在 Visual Basic 中<xref:System.Drawing.Font.Name%2A>屬性<xref:System.Drawing.Font>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要進行轉換的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to a Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="stdFont" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 轉換成 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="stdFont" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="stdFont" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="stdFont" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Basic 6.0 `stdFont` object was COM-based and has no equivalent in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 6.0`stdFont`物件以 COM 為基礎，並在 Visual Basic 中已沒有對等項目。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to convert between a <xref:System.Drawing.Font> and a `stdFont` during project upgrade.
trans-unit.target: 升級工具會使用這個函式之間進行轉換<xref:System.Drawing.Font>和`stdFont`專案升級期間。

trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 運算式。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Converts the Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Format" /> function to be compatible with Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 轉換 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Format" /> 函式，使其與 Visual Basic 相容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the formatted data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，其中包含格式化資料。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Basic 6.0 `Format` function could operate on a `Variant` data type; in Visual Basic the `Variant` data type no longer exists.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 6.0`Format`函數無法用於`Variant`資料類型; 在 Visual Basic 中`Variant`不再有資料類型。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to convert a `Variant` formatted by using the `Format` function to a common language runtime-compliant type.
trans-unit.target: 此函式可由升級工具來轉換`Variant`使用格式化`Format`common language runtime 相容類型的函式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control that currently has focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前具有焦點的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The control that currently has focus.
trans-unit.target: 目前獲得焦點的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to replace the Visual Basic 6.0 `Screen.ActiveControl` property.
trans-unit.target: 此函式，會取代 Visual Basic 6.0 使用升級工具`Screen.ActiveControl`屬性。

trans-unit.source: It is the equivalent of calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 它相當於呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>在 Visual Basic 中。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Button" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Button" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Button" /> is the cancel button on a form.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Button" /> 是否為表單上的取消按鈕。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="btn" /> is the cancel button; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="btn" /> 是取消按鈕，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This function is the equivalent of checking the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 此函式相當於檢查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Button" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Button" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets sets a value that determines whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Button" /> control is the default button on a form.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值判斷 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Button" /> 控制項是否為表單上的預設按鈕。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="btn" /> is the default button; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="btn" /> 是預設按鈕，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This function is the equivalent of checking the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 此函式相當於檢查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the executable file (.exe) for the current application.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前應用程式的可執行檔 (.exe) 名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the name without a file name extension.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含檔案名稱，但不含副檔名。

trans-unit.source: Gets the instance handle (HINSTANCE) for the current application.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前應用程式的執行個體控制代碼 (HINSTANCE)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> for the current application instance.
trans-unit.target: 目前應用程式執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" />。

trans-unit.source: This function is the equivalent of calling <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetHINSTANCE%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此函式相當於呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetHINSTANCE%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Integer" /> that represents the index of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Integer" />，代表 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see langword="Integer" /> associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> item.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 項目相關聯的 <see langword="Integer" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Integer" /> associated with the specified <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 與指定 <see langword="Integer" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem" />。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, the `ItemData` property for a `ListBox` or `ComboBox` control could be set at design time in the **Properties** window to associate an `Integer` with a `ListBox` or `ComboBox` item.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0`ItemData`屬性`ListBox`或`ComboBox`控制項可以設定在設計階段於**屬性**相關聯的視窗`Integer`與`ListBox`或`ComboBox`項目。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, the `ItemData` property no longer exists; the `GetItemData` and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.SetItemData%2A> methods can be used to emulate the behavior of `ItemData`.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中`ItemData`屬性不存在;`GetItemData`和<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.SetItemData%2A>方法可用來模擬行為的`ItemData`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Integer" /> that represents the index of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Integer" />，代表 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.String" /> associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> item.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 項目相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> associated with the specified <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 與指定 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem" />。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to emulate the Visual Basic 6.0 `List` property.
trans-unit.target: 升級工具會使用這個函式來模擬 Visual Basic 6.0`List`屬性。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>屬性改為。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current path for the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前應用程式的路徑。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the path of the currently executing assembly.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含目前執行中組件的路徑。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an OLE <see langword="IPicture" /> object for a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> 的 OLE <see langword="IPicture" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing the OLE <see langword="IPicture" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 表示 OLE <see langword="IPicture" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, an OLE `IPicture` object could be used to specify an icon; in Visual Basic, the OLE `IPicture` format is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，OLE`IPicture`物件無法用來指定圖示; 在 Visual Basic 中，OLE`IPicture`不再支援格式。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to convert between an `IPicture` and a <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.
trans-unit.target: 升級工具會使用這個函式之間進行轉換`IPicture`和<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains a Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="stdFont" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="stdFont" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts a Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="stdFont" /> object to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />.
trans-unit.target: 將 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="stdFont" /> 物件轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: A specified object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 指定要轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Basic 6.0 `stdFont` object was COM-based and has no equivalent in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 6.0`stdFont`物件以 COM 為基礎，並在 Visual Basic 中已沒有對等項目。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to convert between a <xref:System.Drawing.Font> and a `stdFont` during project upgrade.
trans-unit.target: 升級工具會使用這個函式之間進行轉換<xref:System.Drawing.Font>和`stdFont`專案升級期間。

trans-unit.target: 表示 OLE <see langword="IPicture" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, an OLE `IPicture` object could be used to specify an image; in Visual Basic, the OLE `IPicture` format is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，OLE`IPicture`物件無法用來指定映像; 在 Visual Basic 中，OLE`IPicture`不再支援格式。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to convert between an `IPicture` and a <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: 升級工具會使用這個函式之間進行轉換`IPicture`和<xref:System.Drawing.Image>。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.target: 取得指定之 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的 OLE <see langword="IPictureDisp" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, international versions of an application were created by putting all localizable information, such as strings, into a separate resource file (.res) for each language.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0 國際版本的應用程式所建立的所有可當地語系化的資訊，例如字串，將放入不同的資源檔 (.res) 每種語言。

trans-unit.source: At run time, locale-specific resources were loaded from the resource file by calling the `LoadResString`, `LoadResPicture`, and `LoadResData` functions.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段，地區設定專屬的資源已從資源檔載入藉由呼叫`LoadResString`， `LoadResPicture`，和`LoadResData`函式。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, international versions of an application are created by changing the `Language` property of a form at design time.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中，國際版本的應用程式會建立變更`Language`表單，以在設計階段屬性。

trans-unit.source: A separate resource file (.resx) is automatically created for each locale selected.
trans-unit.target: 選取每個地區設定，會自動建立個別的資源檔 (.resx)。

trans-unit.source: You no longer have to explicitly load resources from code; resources are automatically loaded based on the user's locale.
trans-unit.target: 您不再需要明確載入資源從程式碼。使用者的地區設定來設定資源會自動載入架構。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Globalizing Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/globalizing-windows-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[全球化 Windows Form](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/globalizing-windows-forms.md)。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, international versions of an application were created by putting all localizable information, such as strings, into a separate resource file (.res) for each language.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0 國際版本的應用程式所建立的所有可當地語系化的資訊，例如字串，將放入不同的資源檔 (.res) 每種語言。

trans-unit.source: At run time, locale-specific resources were loaded from the resource file by calling the `LoadResString`, `LoadResPicture`, and `LoadResData` functions.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段，地區設定專屬的資源已從資源檔載入藉由呼叫`LoadResString`， `LoadResPicture`，和`LoadResData`函式。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, international versions of an application are created by changing the `Language` property of a form at design time.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中，國際版本的應用程式會建立變更`Language`表單，以在設計階段屬性。

trans-unit.source: A separate resource file (.resx) is automatically created for each locale selected.
trans-unit.target: 選取每個地區設定，會自動建立個別的資源檔 (.resx)。

trans-unit.source: You no longer have to explicitly load resources from code; resources are automatically loaded based on the user's locale.
trans-unit.target: 您不再需要明確載入資源從程式碼。使用者的地區設定來設定資源會自動載入架構。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Globalizing Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/globalizing-windows-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[全球化 Windows Form](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/globalizing-windows-forms.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Double" /> that contains the X coordinate to convert.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Double" />，其中包含要轉換的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: Converts an X coordinate from pixels to twips.
trans-unit.target: 將 X 座標從像素轉換為 Twip。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Double" /> that contains the X coordinate expressed in twips.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Double" />，包含以 Twip 表示的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, coordinates were expressed in twips; in Visual Basic they are expressed in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 座標表示以 twip 為單位; 在 Visual Basic 6.0，在 Visual Basic 中，它們被以像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to convert between the two coordinate systems.
trans-unit.target: 升級工具會使用這個函式，兩個座標系統之間進行轉換。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Double" /> that contains the Y coordinate to convert.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Double" />，其中包含要轉換的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Converts a Y coordinate from pixels to twips.
trans-unit.target: 將 Y 座標從像素轉換為 Twip。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Double" /> that contains the Y coordinate expressed in twips.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Double" />，包含以 Twip 表示的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, coordinates were expressed in twips; in Visual Basic they are expressed in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 座標表示以 twip 為單位; 在 Visual Basic 6.0，在 Visual Basic 中，它們被以像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to convert between the two coordinate systems.
trans-unit.target: 升級工具會使用這個函式，兩個座標系統之間進行轉換。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the key values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，其中包含關鍵值 (Key Value)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to process keystrokes before control is returned to the procedure; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要在控制項傳回到程序之前處理按鍵，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends one or more keystrokes to the active window as if typed at the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 將一個或多個按鍵傳送至使用中的視窗，就像在鍵盤上輸入一樣。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to emulate the Visual Basic 6.0 `SendKeys` method.
trans-unit.target: 升級工具會使用這個函式來模擬 Visual Basic 6.0`SendKeys`方法。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, use the `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` method instead.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 使用`My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys`方法改為。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Button" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Button" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="CommandButton" /> control's <see langword="Cancel" /> property is <see langword="true" />; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="true" /> 控制項的 <see langword="CommandButton" /> 屬性為 <see langword="Cancel" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, the Boolean `Default` and `Cancel` properties of a `CommandButton` control determine whether the control responds to the ENTER or ESC keys, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，布林`Default`和`Cancel`屬性`CommandButton`控制項可讓您判斷是否控制項回應 ENTER 或 ESC 鍵，分別。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control no longer has `Default` or `Cancel` properties.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項不再具有`Default`或`Cancel`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> object has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A> properties that provide the same functionality; these properties take the name of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control as an argument.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>物件具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>屬性，提供相同的功能，這些屬性會取得名稱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項做為引數。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.based on the `Cancel` property of an upgraded Visual Basic 6.0 `CommandButton` control.
trans-unit.target: 此函式用於升級工具設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>上的.based`Cancel`屬性升級的 Visual Basic 6.0`CommandButton`控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Button" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Button" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="CommandButton" /> control's <see langword="Default" /> property is <see langword="true" />; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="true" /> 控制項的 <see langword="CommandButton" /> 屬性為 <see langword="Default" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.based on the `Default` property of an upgraded Visual Basic 6.0 `CommandButton` control.
trans-unit.target: 此函式用於升級工具設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>上的.based`Default`屬性升級的 Visual Basic 6.0`CommandButton`控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Index" /> of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Index" /> 的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Integer" /> to assign to the <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem.ItemData" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給 <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem.ItemData" /> 屬性的 <see langword="Integer" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem.ItemData" /> property for a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem.ItemData" /> 的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, the `ItemData` property for a `ListBox` or `ComboBox` control could be set at design time in the **Properties** window to associate an `Integer` with a `ListBox` or `ComboBox` item.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0`ItemData`屬性`ListBox`或`ComboBox`控制項可以設定在設計階段於**屬性**相關聯的視窗`Integer`與`ListBox`或`ComboBox`項目。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, the `ItemData` property no longer exists; the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.GetItemData%2A> and `SetItemData` methods can be used to emulate the behavior of `ItemData`.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中`ItemData`屬性不存在;<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.GetItemData%2A>和`SetItemData`方法可用來模擬行為的`ItemData`。

trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem.ItemString" /> 的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to emulate the Visual Basic 6.0 `List` property.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>屬性改為。

trans-unit.source: Assigns the name of a Visual Basic 6.0 resource file to the Visual Basic project namespace.
trans-unit.target: 將 Visual Basic 6.0 資源檔的名稱指派至 Visual Basic 專案命名空間。

trans-unit.source: A resource file (.res).
trans-unit.target: 資源檔 (.res)。

trans-unit.source: Assigns the name of a Visual Basic 6.0 resource file to the current Visual Basic project namespace.
trans-unit.target: 將 Visual Basic 6.0 資源檔的名稱指派至目前的 Visual Basic 專案命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Resource handling is different for Visual Basic 6.0 and Visual Basic.

trans-unit.target: 資源檔 (.res)。

trans-unit.target: 要顯示的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FormShowConstants" /> enumeration that specifies modality.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FormShowConstants" /> 列舉型別，指定強制回應性。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: The <c>owner</c> parameter of the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog" /> 方法的 <c>owner</c> 參數。

trans-unit.source: Displays a form by calling either the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show" /> or <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog" /> 方法，即可顯示表單。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, the `Show` method specified whether a Form would be displayed modally; in Visual Basic it is replaced by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0`Show`方法可讓您指定是否會強制顯示表單; 在 Visual Basic 中取代為所<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to map the Visual Basic 6.0 `Show` method to either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 升級工具會使用這個函式對應 Visual Basic 6.0`Show`方法設為 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An expression or list of expressions to print.
trans-unit.target: 要列印的運算式或運算式清單。

trans-unit.source: Formats strings to simulate the Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Debug.Print" /> functionality.
trans-unit.target: 格式化字串以模擬 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Debug.Print" /> 功能。

trans-unit.source: A formatted <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 格式化的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, the `Debug.Print` method had an `outputlist` parameter that specified how output was formatted in the **Immediate** window.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0`Debug.Print`方法具有`outputlist`參數指定輸出的格式化方式**即時運算**視窗。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to translate the `outputlist` parameter into a string for display in the **Immediate** window.
trans-unit.target: 升級工具會使用這個函式轉譯`outputlist`參數中的顯示字串插入**即時運算**視窗。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the height.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" />，表示高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that is used to convert twips to pixels based on screen settings.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值可用來根據螢幕設定將 Twip 轉換為像素。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Double" /> that contains the conversion factor.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Double" />，包含轉換因數。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, coordinates were expressed in twips; in Visual Basic they are expressed in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 座標表示以 twip 為單位; 在 Visual Basic 6.0，在 Visual Basic 中，它們被以像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to convert between the two coordinate systems.
trans-unit.target: 升級工具會使用這個函式，兩個座標系統之間進行轉換。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl" /> where the control is parented.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl" />，其中控制項具有父項目。

trans-unit.source: Emulates the behavior of the Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="ValidateControls" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 模擬 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="ValidateControls" /> 方法的行為。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, the `ValidateControls` method was used to force the `Validate` event for the control that has focus when a form is closed; if the `Validate` event fails, an error was raised.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0`ValidateControls`方法用來強制`Validate`控制項具有焦點，當表單關閉時，如果事件`Validate`事件失敗，發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, the `ValidateControls` method is replaced by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.Validate%2A> method, which returns `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中`ValidateControls`方法取代<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.Validate%2A>方法，這個方法會傳回`true`或`false`。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to emulate the Visual Basic 6.0 behavior.
trans-unit.target: 此函式升級工具用於模擬的 Visual Basic 6.0 行為。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />。

trans-unit.source: Displays pop-up Help for a form upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: 顯示升級自 Visual Basic 6.0 之表單的快顯說明。

trans-unit.source: Pop-up Help in Visual Basic 6.0 was implemented by using the `WhatsThisButton` and `WhatsThisHelp` properties of a form; pop-up Help in Visual Basic is implemented by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A> property of a form.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 6.0 中的快顯說明實作使用`WhatsThisButton`和`WhatsThisHelp`; 快顯表單的內容，說明在 Visual Basic 中的藉由使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A>表單的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to change the method of displaying pop-up Help in an upgraded application.
trans-unit.target: 此函式可由升級工具來變更顯示快顯說明在升級後的應用程式中的方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ZOrderConstants" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ZOrderConstants" /> 列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Converts the Visual Basic <see langword="ZOrder" /> method for use in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 轉換 Visual Basic <see langword="ZOrder" /> 方法，以便在 Visual Basic 中使用。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, the `ZOrder` method was used to specify the layering of controls; in Visual Basic .it is replaced by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SendToBack%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0`ZOrder`方法用來指定控制項的圖層，則在 Visual Basic 中，它會取代所<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SendToBack%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the upgrade tools to map between the methods.
trans-unit.target: 升級的工具使用這個函式在方法之間的對應。
